details:
wifi: mt76: mt7921: fix use after free in mt7921_acpi_read()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 3ed0b382cb36f6dac9f93b3a5533cfcd699409a5, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit f965333e491e36adb0fa91e389fba8685b704fb6. For more details please see the references link.
